entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: Hello! I am Sreekar, a Computer Science and Machine Learning enthusiast. I graduated from University of Massachusetts Amherst where…
entry.content:
Hello! I am Sreekar, a Computer Science and Machine Learning enthusiast.

I graduated from University of Massachusetts Amherst where I completed the Masters program in Computer Science

I completed my undergraduate studies at the Indian Institute of Technology Bombay

I have previously interned at S.R.I. International (Summer 2020), Purdue University (Summer 2018) and INRIA (Nancy) (Summer 2017)
